section.title:
packing lists batch printing of
batch mode printing packing lists using
ship vias printing packing lists by Print Packing List Batch by Ship Via
section.para: If you want to print batches of Packing Lists according to their Ship Via method, select the "Print Packing List Batch by Ship Via" option. Keep in mind this screen only works if you have unprinted Orders already queued up on the Packing List Batch.

tip.para: If you don't see any Ship Vias appearing in the Ship Via list, open the Packing List Batch screen to verify you have unprinted Orders listed there.

mediaobject.caption: Print Packing List Batch by Ship Via

section.para: When printing batches of Packing Lists according to their Ship Via, you are presented with the following options:

note.para: xTuple supports up-to-date shipment tracking with links to the websites of many leading shipping companies (i.e., "Ship Vias").

listitem.para: Specify the Ship Via whose batched Packing Lists you want to print.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing a Packing List batch, returning you to the application desktop.
Prints the Packing List batch for the specified Ship Via.
